Class InsecureSessionDriver

java.lang.Object
  session.AbstractSessionDriver
      session.InsecureSessionDriver
All Implemented Interfaces:
SessionDriver
public class InsecureSessionDriver
extends AbstractSessionDriver
implements SessionDriver

A concrete implementation of an insecure SessionDriver interface. This implementation consists uniquely of a constructor that initializes the session driver as insecure.
